TaskDescription.Detail: After creating a temporary directory, download the RPA v2.1.1 user manual to the temporary directory using the Chrome library. Search the manual (PDF) for pages containing the 'Center' character. Displays text on the entire page as a message box. Saves images that exist on each page containing the 'Center' character as a file and displays the list as a message box. Delete the temporary directory.

Assist.value: Sets a temporary directory path for downloading files.
Enter the variable 'this.workDir' to store the temporary directory path.
The temporary directory enters 'Global.ProjectDir+'sampleDir'+'\\'' to create and use a new folder in the project path.
Creates a directory.
Enter the variable 'this.workDir' where the temporary directory path you want to create is stored.
Create a browser and go to the RPA v2.1.1 man page.
Enter the variable 'this.browser' to store the executed browser information.
Enable to run in headless mode.
Enter the site 'https://www.samsungsdsbiz.com/help/RPA_User_Eng_2_1_1.pdf' to download the PDF file.
Enter the variable 'this.workDir' where the path to the temporary directory where the PDF file will be saved is stored.
Click the Download icon.
Specify the Download icon on the left side of the page.
Click the file you want to download.
Specify 'Birty RPA User Manual (v2.1.1).pdf'.
The 'Birty RPA User Manual (v2.1.1).pdf' file is downloaded and waits for the file to be created.
Enter '100' as the number of seconds to wait for file creation. If the file creation is completed within the entered time, it proceeds to the next step.
Enter the file path to wait for creation 'this.workDir + this.pdfFileName'.
Shut down the browser.
I store the page number that the 'Center' string belongs to in the 'this.pages' variable in the PDF document.
Enter the variable 'this.pages' to store the page number to which the 'Center' string belongs.
Enter the downloaded RPA manual pdf file 'this.workDir + this.pdfFileName'.
Scope the entire page by entering 'All' as the target page range to check if the string 'Center' is included.
Enter the string 'Center' to search for.
Store the text of every page of the PDF document in the variable 'this.text'.
Enter the variable 'this.text' to store the text of all pages of the PDF document.
Enter the downloaded RPA manual pdf file 'this.workDir + this.pdfFileName'.
Enter the target page range as 'All' to span the entire page.
Displays the text of every page of the PDF document as a message box.
Enter the variable 'this.text' where the text of all pages of the PDF document is stored.
Repeat as many pages as the 'Center' string in the PDF document belongs to.
Enter 'this.pageCount = 0' to initialize the variable for iteration.
Enter 'this.pageCount < this.pages.length' to iterate over the number of pages the 'Center' string belongs to.
Enter 'this.pageCount++' to increase the count at each iteration.
Save the images on each page to which the 'Center' string of the PDF document belongs to the variable 'this.images'.
Enter the variable 'this.images' to store the images on each page to which the 'Center' string of the PDF document belongs.
Enter the downloaded RPA manual pdf file 'this.workDir + this.pdfFileName'.
Enter as 'this.pages[this.pageCount]' to make the target page range for each page.
Repeat the number of images on each page to which the 'Center' string in the PDF document belongs.
Enter 'this.imageCount = 0' to initialize the variable for iteration.
Enter 'this.imageCount < this.images.length' to repeat the number of images on the page to which the 'Center' string belongs.
Enter 'this.imageCount++' to increase the count at each iteration.
It saves each image on each page to which the 'Center' string of the PDF document belongs to a file.
Enter 'this.images[this.imageCount]' to select images in order from the variables in which images of each page are stored.
Specify the encoding method of the image file to be saved as 'png'.
Enter the path to the image file to be saved: 'this.workDir + this.pageCount + '-' + this.imageCount + '.png''.
It stores the list of downloaded files and saved image files in the 'this.fileList' variable.
Enter the variable 'this.fileList' to store the list of downloaded and saved image files.
Enter the path 'this.workDir' where the downloaded file and image file are saved.
Displays a list of downloaded and saved image files in a message box.
Enter the variable 'this.fileList' that stores the list to display as a message box.
Delete the temporarily created directory.
Enter the variable 'this.workDir' where the temporarily created directory path is stored.
